mapper.select: SELECT ctgry_id as ctgryId, ctgry_nm as ctgryNm FROM category WHERE ctgry_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') LIMIT 10
SELECT ctgry_id as ctgryId, ctgry_nm as ctgryNm FROM category WHERE ctgry_up_id IS NULL OR ctgry_up_id = ''
SELECT ctgry_id as ctgryId, ctgry_nm as ctgryNm FROM category WHERE ctgry_up_id = #{parentId}
SELECT ctgry_id as ctgryId, ctgry_nm as ctgryNm, ctgry_up_id as ctgryUpId FROM category WHERE ctgry_id = #{ctgryId}
